paper_abstract: In this paper the notion of a kind of clusters of subsets of a set based on rough membership function is introduced. The algebraic structure emerged thereby is studied. A comparison with classical rough sets with respect to the algebraic properties has been made. A many-valued propositional logic for such entities is proposed. Representation theorems in the style of Obtulowicz have been established. (C) 2013 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
